bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks
Station and Media Access Control Connectivity Discovery
IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks - Station and Media Access Control Connectivity Discovery

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document defines a protocol and a set of managed objects that can be used for discovering the physical topology from adjacent stations in IEEE 802(R) LANs.

This document defines a protocol and a set of managed objects that can be used for discovering the physical topology from adjacent stations in IEEE 802(R) LANs. (The PDF of this standard is available at no cost compliments of the IEEE GET program. http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/7433915. Additional downloads are attached or can be downloaded at http://standards.ieee.org/downloads/802.1/index.html)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
